images.description: The Hotel TTC logo featuring 'Hotel TTC Restaurace' text with three stars, all in yellow against a green background, indicating the hotel and restaurant services. Context: Found in the header as the primary site logo. Represents the brand identity. Good resolution but simple graphic design.

A full exterior shot of the Hotel TTC building in winter, showing its light yellow facade, gabled roof, and balconies with tables, surrounded by snow-dusted evergreens and a snowy parking lot with cars. Context: Likely a hero image or general 'about' section image. Provides a comprehensive view of the hotel's appearance and setting. Good overall lighting and shows the building's architecture.

A close-up view of a neatly made hotel bed with white and beige linens and pillows, alongside a small refrigerator and a red chair in the background, suggesting bedroom amenities. Context: Found in the 'Ubytování' (Accommodation) section, likely as a hero banner. Provides a detailed look at the room's comfort and cleanliness. Good lighting, though slightly cropped aspect ratio.

An interior shot of a hotel room, showing the lower level with a bed, a window with orange curtains, and a wooden staircase leading to a mezzanine. Context: Found in the 'Ubytování' (Accommodation) gallery. Illustrates the unique mezzanine room layout. Reasonable resolution for a gallery thumbnail.

An overhead view of the mezzanine level of a hotel room, showing a bed, a skylight, and small windows, with part of the wooden staircase in the foreground. Context: Found in the 'Ubytování' (Accommodation) gallery. Provides a perspective of the upper sleeping area. Reasonable resolution for a gallery thumbnail.

A partial view of a hotel bedroom showing a bed, a small refrigerator with a TV on top, and a wooden wardrobe. Context: Found in the 'Ubytování' (Accommodation) gallery. Highlights the in-room amenities. Reasonable resolution for a gallery thumbnail.

A view from a hotel bedroom, showing the bed in the foreground and a partially open door revealing a section of the bathroom beyond, possibly with a bathtub. Context: Found in the 'Ubytování' (Accommodation) gallery. Shows the room and the connection to the bathroom. Reasonable resolution for a gallery thumbnail.

A wide-angle shot of a hotel bathroom featuring a bathtub, toilet, and sink, with light green and white striped tiles and natural light from a window. Context: Found in the 'Ubytování' (Accommodation) gallery. Displays the bathroom's fixtures and design. Creative wide-angle lens, though slightly distorted.

A wide-angle shot of a hotel bathroom, focusing on the shower cabin, sink, and toilet, with green and white striped tiles and a wooden door. Context: Found in the 'Ubytování' (Accommodation) gallery. Shows the shower area. Creative wide-angle lens, though slightly distorted.

A close-up detail shot of a small bowl containing various hotel amenities like soap and packaged toiletries, placed on a white towel. Context: Found in the 'Ubytování' (Accommodation) gallery. Highlights attention to guest comfort and small details. Good focus.

An interior shot of a hotel room showing a cream-colored armchair, a small side table with a hot water kettle, a bed, and a wooden staircase. Context: Found in the 'Ubytování' (Accommodation) gallery. Displays a comfortable seating area within the room. Reasonable resolution for a gallery thumbnail.

An angled view of the exterior of the Hotel TTC, highlighting the upper terrace with green parasols, set against a bright blue sky. Context: Used as a hero image, possibly for the 'Ceník' (Price List) section, but visually suitable for showcasing the building's exterior in good weather or the terrace. Good light and clear details.

An interior shot of Hotel TTC's bar area, featuring a long, illuminated bar counter with a full beverage fridge, decorated with plants and lanterns, and an aquarium to the left. Context: Used as a hero image for the 'Restaurace' (Restaurant) section. Provides a clear view of the bar setup, suggesting a welcoming atmosphere. Good lighting and composition.

A wide interior shot of the hotel restaurant's dining area with multiple wooden tables and chairs, and a bar counter in the background. Archways separate different sections of the space. Context: Found in the 'Restaurace' (Restaurant) gallery. Shows the overall layout and seating capacity. Good lighting.

An interior shot of the hotel restaurant/bar area, focusing on the bar counter with tall stools and part of the dining space. Context: Found in the 'Restaurace' (Restaurant) gallery. Highlights the bar seating and atmosphere. Good lighting.

An interior shot of the hotel restaurant, showing part of the bar counter extending into the dining area with tables and chairs. Context: Found in the 'Restaurace' (Restaurant) gallery. Gives a perspective of the integrated bar and dining space. Good lighting.

A corner of the restaurant area set up with a long table covered by white tablecloths, likely for a breakfast buffet, with neatly arranged cups and shelves in the background. Context: Found in the 'Restaurace' (Restaurant) gallery. Demonstrates the breakfast setup. Good lighting.

An interior shot of the restaurant, showing wooden tables and chairs, with decorative elements like an anchor and porthole on the far wall, creating a nautical theme. Context: Found in the 'Restaurace' (Restaurant) gallery. Captures the unique decor and atmosphere. Good lighting.

A spacious conference or event room set up with a long table for a formal meal or meeting, featuring colorful walls and model airplanes hanging from the ceiling. Context: Found in the 'Restaurace' (Restaurant) gallery, but visually represents 'Konferenční prostory' (Conference Facilities). Shows the versatility of the space for events. Good lighting.

A close-up of a table setting in a conference or event room, featuring glasses filled with a light beverage, neatly folded napkins, and decorative golden elements. Context: Found in the 'Restaurace' (Restaurant) gallery, but relates to events. Demonstrates the detailed catering setup for events. Good focus and composition.

A close-up shot of a plate with a cheeseburger and a pile of french fries. Context: Found in the 'Restaurace' (Restaurant) gallery. Showcases typical food offerings. Good focus and appetizing presentation.

A close-up shot of a wrap dish, garnished with fresh parsley, presented on a dark plate. Context: Found in the 'Restaurace' (Restaurant) gallery. Showcases typical food offerings. Good focus and appetizing presentation.
